named-query.name: BC_READ_LOCALE_BY_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT locale FROM org.broadleafcommerce.common.locale.domain.Locale locale WHERE locale.localeCode = :localeCode

named-query.name: BC_READ_DEFAULT_LOCALE
named-query.query: SELECT locale FROM org.broadleafcommerce.common.locale.domain.Locale locale WHERE locale.defaultFlag = true
